sentence.Network_en: What would you use a ripcord to pull open?
sentence.Network_cn: 你用拉伞索时需打开什么?

PerfectNetExp.abs: “开伞索（ripcord）”（Ripcord）：防侦查高空跳伞兵种的领队，他对自己的技能、经验都充满自信，在压力面前冷静沉着。“重载”（Heavy Duty）…

G.I.Joe.The.Rise.Of.Cobra... ... turkey: 彻底失败的 ripcord: 开伞锁 perhaps: 可能，或许.

list.abs: ripcord是什么意思... ... Renegades Ripcord ： 变节者 ripcord tourniquet ： 止血带 Ripcord Reactive impact armor ： 开伞锁.

entry.def: A ripcord is the cord that you pull to open a parachute.

means.word_mean: 1. a cord that is pulled to open the gasbag of a balloon wide enough to release gas and so causes the balloon to descend
2. a cord that is pulled to open a parachute from its pack during a descent
